Ah yeah. 
Thing is, talents won't show any ranking value on the chart when you don't spec into it. So we made the comparization chart for Talents assume having points spent in it those talents.
Your gear rankings and all other charts change when you spec any talent, and the custom specs you save are shown in the Talent Specs chart for whatever points you spent.
Try looking at the helmet item chart (threat ranking points) while you spend points in crusade, you'll see what I mean.

I guess the solution would be to have all possible ranks of a talent show an individual ranking bar for the Talent chart. Like:
Crusade 1/3
Crusade 2/3
Crusade 3/3
which is many, many, many bars and looks unclearly arranged. I'll have to see what Solieu thinks about this, but I do agree with you. That's not ideal.
